# HTML

| Linter                              | Additional                                                                                                                                           |
|-------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [djlint (HTML)](html_djlint.md)     | [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/Riverside-Healthcare/djlint?cacheSeconds=3600)](https://github.com/Riverside-Healthcare/djlint) |

## Linted files

- File extensions:
  - `.html`
  - `.htm`

## Configuration in MegaLinter

| Variable                  | Description                   | Default value |
|---------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| HTML_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| HTML_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
